segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar, standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to fall, and it makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's being really reckless right now, not caring about his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilted, and he's stretched out, trying to grab those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl next to him, waiting eagerly for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems to be focused only on the cookies, not on the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he realizes how close he is to falling and getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of the boy's risky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust watching him be so careless about his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so calm, unlike the reckless behavior inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to get down safely without causing an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
